Package de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller

All controller classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutTextController
    Controller for about text.
    AppLayoutController
    Controller for application layout.
    AttachmentEditDialogController
    Controller for attachment edit dialog scene.
    PreferencesDialogController
    Controller for preferences edit dialog scene.
    ProgressDialogController
    Controller for progress dialog scene.
    RefereeCommunicationController
    Controller for the referee communication scene.
    SplashScreenController
    Controller for splash screen.
    StatisticsController
    Controller for statistics scene.

Package de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller Description

All controller classes.

The application tries to follow the model-view-controller approach.
